patthana21.37:1.1: Nahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana21.37:2.1: Nanahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.37:3.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.37:5.1: Nahetuṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.37:6.1: Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
